Name: MagiCarnage
About the game: Once every millennium, the greatest magical beings gather together in order to engage one another in mystical combat. This is MagiCarnage. A tournament held to prove who is the strongest magic user in the realm, and worthy of the title 'Champion Magus'. MagiCarnage is a top down, arena-fighting twin-stick shooter game. You will play as magical beings and engage in battles with others utilizing a large selection of unique and powerful spells. Online Multiplayer Local Multiplayer Single Player Mode Partial Controller Support Customizable loadouts Tons of unique spells Plenty of skins to unlock and choose from (Controllers are required for local multiplayer)
